data.title: Joke Silva Shares Heartfelt Tribute as Olu Jacobs Turns 82
data.meta_description: Veteran Nigerian actor Olu Jacobs turned 82 today, June 11, and his family and well-wishers shared heartfelt messages on social media to celebrate him.
data.meta_site_name: News Central TV | Latest Breaking News Across Africa, Daily News in Nigeria, South Africa, Ghana, Kenya and Egypt Today. - Africa. First.
data.text:
Veteran Nigerian actor Olu Jacobs turned 82 today, June 11, and his family and well-wishers shared heartfelt messages on social media to celebrate him.

His wife and industry colleague, Joke Silva, posted a video with a short tribute to mark his special day.

“82 just like that… Agba ko mi nira l’agbara Jesu… Sir J of life @_olujacobs. Wishing you an amazing year ahead,” she wrote on Thursday.

A few weeks ago, rumours spread on social media that Olu Jacobs had passed away. However, his family quickly dispelled these reports, confirming that he is alive and well.

News Central also extends birthday wishes to Olu Jacobs, celebrating his remarkable milestone.
